summary: Adds a short quest leading to a powerful ring.
descriptionHtml:
I made this a while back, and I'm finally gonna upload it.Â 

This adds a note on Farengar (Whiterun Court Wizard)'s desk that starts a simple quest to retrieve a ring. This ring is basically the "One Ring" from LoTR, or at least what I know about it from the Hobbit movies.

The ring:
-Makes you invisible
-Greatly Improves Sneak
-Adds a cool visual effect, similar to the movie.

if you aren't invisible, try sneaking or unequipping the ring. I honestly don't remember if the invis effect is sneak only or not (I made this mod a year ago).

Please use the Nexus Mod Manager to install, 'cuz I forgot the normal way and don't feel like looking it up.
author: Xenn2423
